name: Edafico
description:
A little fun game made in Unity.
I learn a lot from making this game.
May have some errors (WebGL version untested), but nothing critical.

░▒▓ CONTROLS ▓▒░

Controls can be binded in game.
Default controls:

Left and Right arrow: Move and aim horizontal.

Up and Down arrow: Aim vertical.

Z: Teleport.

R: Restart level.

F12: Fullscreen (on/off).

Esc: Pause and options menu.

Suport controller!
